item.description:
Co-owner of the amazing vegan restaurant G-Zen, Ami Beach, and Lisa Sobolewski, creator of JUSTFOOD, a soon-to-be-opening raw vegan juice, smoothie, and chocolate bar in Chester, CT are co-organizing what is going to be the largest and most delicious RAW FOOD POTLUCK ever!

What to Bring? A raw (un-cooked), vegan (meat and dairy-free) dish made of whole vegetables, fruits, sprouts, nuts and seeds that serves 10-15 people. Some ideas of what to make are a fruit soup, fruit salad, sprout salad, bag of oranges, green juice, Italian entree like zucchini pasta or rawsagna, sushi/maki rolls, veggie burgers, hummus and crudites, raw crackers, a chocolate surprise - whatever you are inspired to make in the moment will be enjoyed!

Please also...

RSVP here: JUSTFOOD

We looking forward to bringing a few different communities together at this special location to share JUSTFOOD!

JUSTFOOD has a facebook page: www.thefacebook.com/JUSTFOODbylisasobolewski

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

"A teacher once told me that if I wanted lasting happiness the only way to get it was to step out of my cocoon. When I asked her how to bring happiness to others she said, "Same instruction." This is the reason that I work with the aspiration practices of the four limitless qualities of loving-kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity: the best way to serve ourselves is to love and care for others. These are powerful tools for dissolving the barriers that perpetuate the suffering of all beings." - Pema Chodron (from Comfortable with Uncertainty)

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Raw Vegan Potluck at G-Zen Restaurant
